2164.subject: LS
2164.descrlong: This course is designed to advance students' tutoring skills in the classroom. It is aimed at helping the tutors to adequately manage small and large groups of students, to learn about the migrant lifestyle, and to build a strong rapport with migrant students and staff. Students must be admitted to the Mini-Corps program prior to enrollment. The class may be repeated for credit.  (Credit/No Credit Available)
